product_name: Park Tool Big Blue Book of Bicycle Repair - 3rd Edition
long_description: Supplying comprehensive information for nearly any bike repair from roadside fixes to overhauls, the updated edition of Big Blue Book of Bicycle Repair demystifies the workings of your bike.
short_description: Supplying comprehensive information for nearly any bike repair from roadside fixes to overhauls, the updated edition of Big Blue Book of Bicycle Repair demystifies the workings of your bike.
